trans-unit.source: Represents a base class with members common to an element that is used to configure security settings.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个基类，其成员为用于配置安全设置的元素所共有。

trans-unit.source: A pair that consists of an authentication mode and a binding element.
trans-unit.target: 由一种身份验证模式和一个绑定元素组成的对。

trans-unit.source: The authentication mode used for message exchange.
trans-unit.target: 用于消息交换的身份验证模式。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified configuration template to this instance.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的配置模板应用到此实例。

trans-unit.source: A pair that consists of an authentication mode and a binding element.
trans-unit.target: 由一种身份验证模式和一个绑定元素组成的对。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified configuration templates to this instance.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的配置模板应用到此实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether unsecured transport is permitted.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否允许不安全的传输。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if unsecured transport is permitted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许不安全的传输，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a boolean value that specifies whether a serialized token can be used on reply.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指定是否可以在答复时使用序列化令牌。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a serialized token can be used on reply; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以在答复时使用序列化令牌，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A binding element.
trans-unit.target: 一个绑定元素。

trans-unit.source: Applies the content of a specified binding element to this binding configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 将指定绑定元素的内容应用到此绑定配置元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the authentication setting used for message exchange.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于消息交换的身份验证设置。

trans-unit.source: The authentication setting used for message exchange.
trans-unit.target: 用于消息交换的身份验证设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of this binding element.
trans-unit.target: 获取此绑定元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of this binding element.
trans-unit.target: 此绑定元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the security context token can be renewed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以续订安全上下文令牌。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the security context token can be renewed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以续订安全上下文，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The configuration element to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 要复制的配置元素。

trans-unit.source: Copies the content of the specified configuration element to this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 将指定配置元素的内容复制到此配置元素。

trans-unit.source: Creates a custom binding element object.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个自定义绑定元素对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a custom binding element object from the setting of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 根据此实例的设置创建一个自定义绑定元素对象。

trans-unit.source: A custom <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个自定义 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to create only a template; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 仅创建模板，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a custom binding element object from the setting of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 根据此实例的设置创建一个自定义绑定元素对象。

trans-unit.source: A custom <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个自定义 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default algorithm suite for this binding.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此绑定的默认算法套件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite" /> that specifies the default algorithm suite for this binding.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite" />，指定此绑定的默认算法组。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite.Basic256" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite.Basic256" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether unsecured response is permitted.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否允许不安全的响应。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if unsecured response is permitted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许不安全的响应，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether each message contains a timestamp.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指定是否每个消息都包含时间戳。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if message contains a timestamp; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果消息包含时间戳，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A binding element.
trans-unit.target: 一个绑定元素。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this binding configuration element with the content of the specified binding element.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定绑定元素的内容来初始化此绑定配置元素。

trans-unit.source: The specified security token parameters.
trans-unit.target: 指定的安全令牌参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that all the nested bindings are updated with the values specified by <c>sp</c>; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定使用 <c>sp</c> 所指定的值来更新所有嵌套绑定，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified security token settings to this instance.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的安全令牌设置应用到此实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the configuration element that specifies the current issued token.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定当前颁发令牌的配置元素。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IssuedTokenParametersElement" /> that specifies the current issued token.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IssuedTokenParametersElement" />，指定当前颁发令牌。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source of entropy used to create keys.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于创建密钥的熵来源。

trans-unit.source: A valid <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityKeyEntropyMode" /> value that specifies the source of entropy used to create keys.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityKeyEntropyMode" /> 值，该值指定用于创建密钥的熵的来源。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityKeyEntropyMode.CombinedEntropy" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityKeyEntropyMode.CombinedEntropy" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the local client security settings for this binding.
trans-unit.target: 获取此绑定的本地客户端安全设置。

trans-unit.source: The local client security settings for this binding.
trans-unit.target: 此绑定的本地客户端安全设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the local service security settings for this binding.
trans-unit.target: 获取此绑定的本地服务安全设置。

trans-unit.source: The local service security settings for this binding.
trans-unit.target: 此绑定的本地服务安全设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the order of message encryption and signing for this binding.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此绑定的消息加密和签名的顺序。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder" /> that specifies how message is protected.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定如何保护消息的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder.SignBeforeEncrypt" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder.SignBeforeEncrypt" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the version used for message security.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于消息安全的版本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion" /> that specifies the version used for message security.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion" />，指定用于消息安全的版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> instance that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> objects that can be attributes or <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> 实例，该实例包含一个 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> 对象集合，这些对象可以是此配置元素的属性或 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> instance that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> objects that can be attributes or <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> 实例，该实例包含一个 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> 对象集合，这些对象可以是此配置元素的属性或 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the security element base protects tokens.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指示安全元素基是否保护令牌的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the security element base protects tokens; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果安全元素基本保护标记，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether derived keys are required.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指定是否需要派生密钥。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if derived keys are required; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要派生密钥，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether security context should be cancelled and terminated when it is no longer required.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指定当不再需要安全上下文时，是否应将其取消和终止。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if security context should be cancelled and terminated when it is no longer required; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当不再需要安全上下文时应将其取消和终止，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether message signatures must be confirmed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指定是否必须确认消息签名。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if message signatures must be confirmed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果必须确认消息签名，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the order of elements in the security header for this binding.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此绑定的安全标头中的元素顺序。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout" /> that specifies the order of elements in the security header for this binding.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout" />，指定此绑定的安全标头中的元素顺序。

trans-unit.source: The XML writer that writes the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 写入配置文件的 XML 编写器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to serialize only the collection key properties; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果只序列化集合键属性，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of this configuration element to the configuration file when implemented in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中实现后，将此配置元素的内容写入配置文件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if any data was actually serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果实际序列化所有数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> that is used to write to the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 用于写入配置文件的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> to be written.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: Writes the outer tags of this configuration element to the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 将此配置元素的外部标记写入配置文件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the serialization is successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果序列化成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> object at the current level that contains a merged view of the properties.
trans-unit.target: 当前级别上的一个包含属性合并视图的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The parent <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> object, or <see langword="null" /> if this is the top level.
trans-unit.target: 父级 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> 对象或 <see langword="null" />（如果该级别为顶级）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode" /> object that determines which property values to include.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode" /> 对象，确定要包括哪些属性值。

trans-unit.source: Modifies this configuration element to remove all values that should not be saved.
trans-unit.target: 请修改此配置元素以移除所有不应该保存的值。
